page.title: 14 MORLEY'S COACHES-WEST ROW
page.content:
IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE IS A LARGE GARAGE FRONTED BY A HUGE YARD - THE HOME OF MORLEY'S GREY COACHES. THE GARAGE ITSELF DATES BACK TO 1926, ALTHOUGH THE MORLEY FAMILY OF WEST ROW HAVE BEEN ASSOCIATED WITH THE HAULAGE BUSINESS SINCE THE TIME OF GREAT-GRANDFATHER MORLEY WHO TOOK GOODS TO BURY MARKET BY HORSE AND CART. MORLEY'S GREY COACHES OPERATE LOCAL SCHOOL RUNS, SERVICES TO NEWMARKET AND CAMBRIDGE, TRIPS TO THE SEASIDE AND TAKE PARTIES TO MANY PARTS OF EUROPE.
SADLY, SINCE THIS SURVEY WAS UNDER- TAKEN, MORLEY'S GREY COACHES HAVE CEASED TRADING. THE GARAGE, WHICH WAS ONCE SUCH A BUSY PART OF THE VILLAGE, IS STRANGELY QUIET AND DESERTED.
